sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Weather.css' import axios from 'axios'; function Weather(props) { return (

{props.title}

{props.country}

{props.date}
< ul className='w-ul'>
  • {props.lat ? `lat:${props.lat}` : null}
  • {props.long}
    • {props.text}

    {props.mintemp}

    {props.avgtemp}

    {props.avgtemp}

    ) } export default Weather;
